main event: A radar target was observed near Harlingen AFB, Texas, on November 7, 1957, estimated to travel at speeds of 1900 mph before disappearing.
interesting points: The radar target disappeared and reappeared several times during the observation period,The sighting lasted between 2 to 3 minutes,Various conclusions regarding the nature of the target include it being a balloon, aircraft, or possibly astronomical,No photographic evidence was included in the report,The report also discussed indicators of radar malfunctions and the potential of the sighting being an unidentified aircraft.
sighted object: radar target similar to T-33 aircraft
